metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9206 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
Unauthenticated arbitrary file upload vulnerability in Blueimp jQuery-File-Upload <= v9.22.0

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-jquery-file-upload - 9.19.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: msalvatore> Larry Cashdollar (discoverer) emailed security@ubuntu saying that, "The code is just in a different spot and gzip compressed."

criterions.comment: libjs-jquery-file-upload package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.19.1-1ubuntu0.1').
